task.title: How to Assemble the Burrito
task.shortdesc: Okay , it is time to put the burrito together.

prereq.p: You should already have the bacon, vegetables, black beans, and eggs prepared.
You should already have the chickpeas, vegetables, and eggs prepared.
The only thing that you will need to assemble the burrito is a flour or corn tortilla.

step.cmd: Place the bacon, vegetables, black beans, and eggs onto the flat tortilla in any proportions that you want.
Place the chickpeas, vegetables, and eggs onto the flat tortilla in any proportions that you want.
Roll the tortilla up, and it is ready to eat.

postreq.p: Quickly make the rest of the breakfast so that you can eat!
